div.p: This value set defines the set of codes for describing the type or mode of the patient's preferred language.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/language-preference-type defines the following codes:

tr.td: The patient prefers to verbally communicate with the associated language.
The patient prefers to communicate in writing with the associated language.
